description: This table contains information for a single NDC code on a pharmacy claim.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record

columns.name: HAS_UNMAPPED_CODE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a service line has an unmapped NDC code. 'Y' indicates that the service line has unmapped NDC code. 'N' or NULL indicates that the service line is linked to an NDC code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DTL_SVC_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
